synopsis.text: Ichigo Hoshimiya is an ordinary middle school student until her best friend Aoi encourages her to enroll in the prestigious Starlight Academy, a training school for aspiring idols. At Starlight Academy, Ichigo meets various rivals and talented students as she strives to become a successful idol herself. Ichigo and the other students at the academy undergo rigorous training in singing, dancing, and other skills integral for idols. They also participate in numerous auditions and competitions, challenging themselves to improve their talents. Throughout her time at the academy, Ichigo forms close friendships and experiences her fair share of heartbreaks and setbacks. However, she persists in pursuing her dreams. One of the unique aspects of the idol training process is the use of Aikatsu! cards. These cards allow the students to accessorize different outfits that they wear for performances and auditions. By collecting cards and coordinating her outfits, Ichigo is able to better express her personality and style as an idol. Overall, Ichigoâ€™s life is transformed by enrolling in Starlight Academy. What was once an average school girl is now chasing her dreams on the path to idol stardom, facing rivals, adventures, laughter and tears along the way. Through passion and hard work, Ichigo strives to light up the hearts of fans, bringing joy through her performances.
